column5: Let New Braunfels float your blues away and welcome to you home away from home! Private yard (pet friendly), luxury living and private entrance with all the needed essentials. If this is a special occasion, please let us know and we will make sure to add a special touch (flowers, candy, favorite wine or any reasonable request). All furniture will be in place before your visit. Lockbox access. Portion of the proceeds go to help a child in need. 2nd bed is an air mattress (2) in the living room.
